name: Member Directory
description: Membership directory manager with API integrations.

APP_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

APP_NAME.description: The name of the application, used at login and in emails.

APP_BASE_URI.description: The URl of the application, used in email template building.

APP_LOGO.description: A browser-compatible image, used on login page and in self-service updates.

APP_EMAIL_TO.description: The administrator email address to receive notifications.

APP_EMAIL_FROM.description: The outbound email address for replies.

USPS_USERNAME.description: USPS API username for address validation.

USPS_PASSWORD.description: USPS API password for address validation.

CAMPAIGN_MONITOR_API_KEY.description: Campaign Monitor API key for the email service integration.

CAMPAIGN_MONITOR_DEFAULT_LIST_ID.description: Campaign Monitor list ID for the email service integration.

TWILIO_DSN.description: Configuration settings for the SMS and Phone integration.

APP_VOICEMAIL_MESSAGE.description: Voicemail text to read when using the Phone integration.

APP_VOICEMAIL_VOICE.description: Voice to use when reading voicemail prompt for Phone integration.

APP_VOICEMAIL_LANGUAGE.description: Language inflection to use when reading the voicemail prompt for Phone integration
